description: Impose changing concentrations of reduced RCP7.0 aerosol precursors. Beginning in 2014 with air quality policies (or maximum feasible reductions) applied to the SSP3-7 NTCF emissions.
name: RCP70 Reduced Aerosol Precursors
longName: Reduced Representative Concentration Pathway 7.0 Aerosol Precursors
keywords: Representative Concentration Pathway 7.0, future, 21st century, SSP3, RCP7.0, reduced aerosol precursors
